string-array.name: rules
string-array.item: If the word/phrase contains the user-chosen letter, any occurrences of the hidden letter will be revealed
If the letter is present, player will receive the amount of points equivalent to the value drawn from spinning the wheel
If letter is not present, player will not receive any points and lose a life
If the spin value shows "Bankrupt", your score gets reset to zero
If the spin value shows "Miss Turn", you will lose a life
The game is simply won by guessing all the letters necessary to reveal the entire word/phase with at least 1 life remaining
The game is lost when you have 0 lives remaining
